remarks: Positive integer exponentiation of a product.  Proposition 10-4.2(c) of [Gleason] p. 135, restricted to nonnegative integer exponents. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
expcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulexpd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulexpd.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
mulexpd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. B ) ^ N ) = ( ( A ^ N ) x. ( B ^ N ) ) ) $.
